Flavor Pairing Party - Host a flavor pairing party with friends and family, where you taste different foods and drinks together and experiment with unique flavor combinations. Confidence score: 0.8

Visual-Based Cooking - Utilize cooking shows and recipes with detailed images to guide your cooking. This way, you can still enjoy the visual aspect of food and cooking without relying on taste. Confidence score: 0.7
Aroma-Based Cooking - Focus on the aroma of food instead of taste. Experiment with different spices, herbs, and seasonings to create unique and delicious dishes. Confidence score: 0.8
Cooking with Memory - Use memories of past meals and dishes to guide your cooking. Think about the flavors, textures, and aromas of those meals and try to recreate them. Confidence score: 0.7

Interactive Cooking - Engage in interactive cooking experiences with others, such as cooking classes or cooking workshops. This way, you can still enjoy the process of cooking and learning about different cuisines without relying on taste. Confidence score: 0.8
